snippet: The State Supreme Court ruled 8 to 1 on Tuesday that the Legislature had the authority to repeal the Common Core education standards for English and math in public schools.
abstract: Oklahoma Supreme Court rules that State Legislature has authority to repeal Common Core education standards for English and math in public schools.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court ruled 8 to 1 on Tuesday that the Legislature had the authority to repeal the Common Core education standards for English and math in public schools.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Court Upholds Repeal of Common Core Standards
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Court Upholds Repeal of Common Core Standards
